comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Presumably Emeterio de la Garza, Jr., Special Representative of President Victoriano Huerta of Mexico. See NYT of Nov 15, 1913. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9D07E7D81E3BE633A...

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: swanq: It certainly does seem to be Emeterio de la Garza, Jr. There is an image of him in the New York Times in this article which appears to confirm his identity. Thanks for the heads up! We will update this record with more about Mr. Garza.
